colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030A *, ,(ZHES RDO RJE DBYINGS PHYUG MA SOGS KYI SGO NAS SPYI DANG BYE BRAG GI GTOR DBANG JI LTAR BSKUR BA'I TSUL NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA RMAD BYUNG DNGOS GRUB KUN GYI MYU GU ZHES BYA 'DI YANG, ^RVA ROL MKHAN SPRUL SU CUG THU CHOS RJER 'BOD PAS MDZOD DGE THANG SKOR GYI SA'I CHA, KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE SOGS DAM PA MANG POS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I GNAS DKAR ZHU DKON DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SOR MO'I 'DU BYED LA MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZE DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BYAMS PA BSTAN 'PHEL,
